name: infection-risk-assessment-app
description: Assessing the risk of contagious viral infections (COVID-19)

scripts.build-charite: npm run prepare-charite && cross-env LAYOUT=CHARITE npm run build
scripts.build-stanford: npm run prepare-stanford && cross-env SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES=en npm run build
scripts.prepare-bmg: rimraf custom && mkdir custom && copyfiles ./deploy/bmg/**/* custom -u 2 -V && copyfiles ./deploy/bmg/* custom -u 2 -V
scripts.prepare-bzga: rimraf custom && mkdir custom && copyfiles ./deploy/bzga/**/* custom -u 2 -V && copyfiles ./deploy/bzga/* custom -u 2 -V
scripts.prepare-charite: rimraf custom && mkdir custom && copyfiles ./deploy/charite/**/* custom -u 2 -V && copyfiles ./deploy/charite/* custom -u 2 -V
scripts.prepare-rki: rimraf custom && mkdir custom && copyfiles ./deploy/rki/**/* custom -u 2 -V && copyfiles ./deploy/rki/* custom -u 2 -V
scripts.prepare-stanford: rimraf custom && mkdir custom && copyfiles ./deploy/stanford/**/* custom -u 2 -V && copyfiles ./deploy/stanford/* custom -u 2 -V
scripts.start-charite: npm run prepare-charite && cross-env LAYOUT=CHARITE npm run start
scripts.start-stanford: npm run prepare-stanford && cross-env SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES=en npm run start
